trans-unit.source: Represents an x-, y-, and z-coordinate point in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] space.
trans-unit.target: x, y 및 z 좌표 점을 나타냅니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] 공간입니다.

trans-unit.source: In XAML, the delimiter between the values of a Point3D can be either a comma or a space.
trans-unit.target: Xaml에서는 Point3D 값 사이의 구분 기호는 쉼표 또는 공백 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character.
trans-unit.target: 일부 문화권 소수점 구분 기호로 마침표 대신로 쉼표 문자를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 고정 문화권에 대 한 처리 하는 XAML 대부분 XAML 프로세서 구현에서 EN-US로 기본값을 소수 구분 기호로 마침표 속해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a Point3D in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a Point3D attribute value into its components.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 쉼표 문자 소수점 구분 xaml에서는 한 Point3D를 지정 하는 경우 해당 구성 요소에는 Point3D 특성 값의 문자열 형식 변환 충돌 됩니다 때문에 하면 안 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` -or ``` ## XAML Values *x* The x-coordinate of this Point3D.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` -or ``` # # XAML 값 *x* 이 Point3D의 x 좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: *y* The y-coordinate of this Point3D.
*z* The z-coordinate of this Point3D.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*> value of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y*> value of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z*> value of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.

Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 구조체는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> 으로 결과 반환 하 고는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure is prohibited.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure to add.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> structure to add.
The sum of point and vector.

Determines whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure and if so, whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z*> properties of the specified <xref:System.Object> are equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z*> properties of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 개체가 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 구조 그리고 있다면 여부는 <> </> *>, <> </> *>, 및 <> </> *>는 지정 된 속성 <xref:System.Object>과 같은 <> </> *>, <> </> *>, 및 <> </> *>이 속성 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 구조.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If `o` is not a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure, this method returns `false`.

Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Double>두 비교에서 산술 연산을 수행 되 면 값 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>논리적으로 동일한 인스턴스가 실패할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>인스턴스가 동일 하면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: if o is a structure and if it is also identical to this structure; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 o 는 구조와 동일 이기도 경우 그렇지 그렇지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structures for equality.

Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Double>두 비교에서 산술 연산을 수행 되 면 값 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>논리적으로 동일한 인스턴스가 실패할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> to compare to this instance.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if instances are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>인스턴스가 서로 같으면; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structures for equality.

Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>구조체가 다른 경우 값의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>속성은 동일 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.

The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure to compare.
if the , , and values for point1 and point2 are equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 해시 코드를 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 해시 코드를 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 변환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 구조체로 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure to transform.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure to use for the transformation.
A transformed structure, the result of transforming point by matrix.
trans-unit.target: 변환 된 구조, 변형 결과 point 여 matrix 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure by the specified amounts.
trans-unit.target: 변환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 으로 지정 된 크기는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: This operation is equivalent to adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure with the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 이 작업은 해당 추가 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>해당 포함 된 구조 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A>값.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>

trans-unit.source: Note that calling the Offset method will only have an effect if you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 참고는 메서드를 호출 하면 오프셋만 영향을 미칠 변경할 수 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>속성을 직접.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> is a value type, if you reference a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>값 형식인를 참조 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>개체 속성 또는 인덱서를 사용 하 여 개체에 대 한 참조가 아니라 개체의 복사본을 얻게.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 변경 하려는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A>속성 또는 인덱서 참조에서 컴파일러 오류가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, calling Offset on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로, 속성 또는 인덱서에서 오프셋을 호출 해도 기본 개체를 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>, modify its fields, and then assign the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> back to the property or indexer.
trans-unit.target: 값을 변경 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>속성 또는 인덱서 참조 되는, 새 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>, 해당 필드를 수정 하 고 그런 다음 할당할는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>를 속성 또는 인덱서.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: The amount to change the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X*> coordinate of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
The amount to change the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y*> coordinate of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
The amount to change the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z*> coordinate of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.

Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure is prohibited.
The point to add.
The vector to add.
A structure that is the sum of point and vector.

Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> , and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.

if the , , and coordinates of point1 and point2 are equal; otherwise, .

The matrix that is used to transform `point`.

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming point by using matrix.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure from a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure on which to perform subtraction.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure to subtract from `point1`.
A structure that represents the difference between point1 and point2.
trans-unit.target: A 사이의 차이 나타내는 구조 point1 및 point2 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> structure from a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure from which to subtract vector.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> structure to subtract from point.
The changed structure, the result of subtracting vector from point.
trans-unit.target: 변경 된 구조을 뺀 결과인 vector 에서 point 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.String> representation of a 3-D point into the equivalent <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 변환 된 <xref:System.String>해당 3 차원 점의 표현을 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref> 구조.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> representation of the 3-D point.

A structure that represents the difference between point1 and point2.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString*>.
The string specifying the format to use.
-or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.

trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 형식에서 현재 인스턴스의 값을 포함 하는 문자열입니다.
